  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105799</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dear Me - Remembering the Life Lessons of 9/11 on Its Fifth Anniversary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lieb ich - Erinnern an die Leben-Lektionen von 
9/11 auf seinem fünften Jahrestag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cher je - se rappeler les leçons de la vie de 
9/11 sur son cinquième anniversaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caro mim - recordando as lições da vida de 9/11 
em seu quinto anniversary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caro me - ricordarsi delle lezioni di vita di 9/11
sul relativo quinto anniversario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγαπητός εγώ - θυσμένος τα μαθήματα ζωής του 9/11 
στην πέμπτη επέτειό του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Querido yo - recordar las lecciones de la vida de 
9/11 en su quinto aniversario</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will go on a "Memorializing 9/11" gallery walk and then write a letter to themselves that will be sent to them in one year about the lessons they have learned from catastrophic life and world events.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion gehen Kursteilnehmer auf einen 
"Memorializing 9/11" Galerieweg und schreiben selbst dann einen Brief,
die ihnen in einem Jahr über die Lektionen geschickt werden, die, sie
von den verhängnisvollen Leben- und Weltfällen erlernt haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants iront sur une 
promenade de galerie de "Memorializing 9/11" et puis écriront une 
lettre eux-mêmes qui leur seront envoyés en un an au sujet des 
leçons qu'ils ont apprises des événements catastrophiques de la vie
et du monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes irã0 de "em uma 
caminhada da galeria Memorializing 9/11" e seescrever--ão então uma 
letra que lhes serão emitidos em um ano sobre as lições que 
aprenderam dos eventos catastróficos da vida e do mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi andranno "su una 
camminata della galleria di Memorializing 9/11" ed allora scriveranno 
una lettera se stesso che saranno trasmessi loro durante un anno circa
le lezioni che hanno imparato dagli eventi catastrofici del mondo e di
vita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα πάνε σε ένα 
"Memorializing 9/11" περίπατος στοών και θα γράψουν έπειτα 
μια επιστολή σε τους ότι θα σταλεί σε τους σε ένα έτος για τα 
μαθήματα που έχουν μάθει από τα καταστροφικά γεγονότα ζωής και 
κόσμων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes irán en una 
caminata de la galería de "Memorializing 9/11" y después escribirán
una letra sí mismos que les sean enviados en un año sobre las 
lecciones que han aprendido de acontecimientos catastróficos de la 
vida y del mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
